channel.title: Effective Java on Jian Liew
channel.description: Recent content in Effective Java on Jian Liew

item.title: Prefer for loops
item.description: Programmers tend to write loops in many different ways. If you first language is C, one of the more interesting things was with the way you would have to declare local variables at the head of the block. for (Element e : c) { ... // Omitted }
